name: Ring of Fire Pinball
description:
Based on 3D Pinball Space Cadet, this game brings a faster pace and more explosions. Shoot the Ring of Fire to start up a mission, then complete various tasks to get the next mission, with massive points bonuses for every task. Level up groups of targets by lighting them all up/knocking them all down to increase the points gained from hitting them. Smooth, pretty, and addictive, Ring of Fire Pinball was designed to be less difficult than its inspiration game, but no less challenging to master.

Features:

  • Explosions!
  • Multi-ball! Activate as many times at once as you like.
  • Challenging mission system with eight different missions, increasing in difficulty.
  • High score screen.
  • Fully fledged options menu with instant adjustment.
  • Butter-smooth physics, with easily controlled flippers.
  • Replay-ball system - hit a tunnel when its arrow is yellow to get the ball back if it drains.
  • Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux versions available - works on 32-bit and 64-bit systems.
  • A free Manual.pdf file explaining every aspect of the game is included.
